title: Google’s proposed data center in orbit will face issues with space debris in an already crowded orbit
description: Google’s Project Suncatcher would need sophisticated collision avoidance capabilities to navigate a junk-filled landscape.
content:
This rendering shows satellites orbiting Earth. yucelyilmaz/iStock via Getty Images
The rapid expansion of artificial intelligence and cloud services has led to a massive demand for computing power.… [+8914 chars]

raw_data.author: Mojtaba Akhavan-Tafti, Associate Research Scientist, University of Michigan
